email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston under CFR terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 220m.

Our starting offer is USD 85 per metric ton. The laycan is set for October 20-25, 2023. Please let us know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. USD 85/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 78/MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's draft?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
Cargo Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 80/MT. The vessel's draft is 12.5m, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 80/MT is still higher than our target. Given the current market, we would be more comfortable at USD 75/MT. Also, could you extend the laycan to October 22-27 to accommodate our loading schedule?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

After further consideration, we can agree to USD 77/MT with the extended laycan of October 22-27. This is our final offer, and we hope it meets your requirements.

Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the recap.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We accept your final offer of USD 77/MT with the extended laycan. Please send over the recap for our records.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find the recap attached below:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
Freight: USD 77/MT
Laycan: October 22-27, 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
